query: Select MAX(CASE WHEN n_elems=1 THEN 'Simple' ELSE 'Compound' END) AS kind,MAX(case when left(data,1)='[' THEN 'BEEF' ELSE data END) AS xc,POW(AVG(POW(ce-expt_ce,2)),0.5) AS rmse from bulks join job on job=job_id join calc on calc=calc_id join functional on functional=functional_id where expt_ce-ce is not null GROUP BY data,n_elems
title: RMSE Cohesive energy errors
